text: Brief Encounters () is a 1967 Soviet drama movie directed by Kira Muratova.В "Иллюзионе" пройдет программа памяти актрисы театра и кино Нины РуслановойКороткие встречи It stars Nina Ruslanova, Vladimir Vysotsky, and Kira Muratova. ==Actors== *Nina Ruslanova – Nadia *Vladimir Vysotsky – Maxim *Kira Muratova – Valentina *Lydia Bazilskaya – Lyubka *Olga Viklandt – hairdresser == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian romance movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1967 romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Kira Muratova Category:Soviet romance movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Brief Encounters (movie)
